elementSpec.desc: contains two times or another phrase indicating a time period.

attDef.desc: indicates the starting point of the time period in a standard form, usually hh:mm:ss.
attDef.valDesc: A normalized form of temporal expression conforming to the W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition, except that times may be expressed with reduced precision (i.e., to the minute or the hour). Software intended for use with W3C XML Schema datatypes may be unable to properly process times expressed with reduced precision.

attDef.desc: indicates the ending point of the time period in standard form, usually hh:mm:ss.
attDef.valDesc: A normalized form of temporal expression conforming to the W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition, except that times may be expressed with reduced precision (i.e., to the minute or the hour). Software intended for use with W3C XML Schema datatypes may be unable to properly process times expressed with reduced precision.

attDef.desc: indicates the precision to be attached to either or both times specified.

valItem.gloss: both times are approximate or unspecified
